section.name: General Settings
section.description: This section contains general illustration information and settings for this project.

setting.name: Illustrations Library
setting.description: The library of illustrations this component type will draw from. The library must be found in a folder of the same name installed in the user illustrations library.

setting.name: Preserve USFM FIG Data
setting.description: By default, \fig marker data is logged in the project illustration configuration file and removed from the working text. If set to True, this action will be overridden.
